Despite being unable to speak, Yutaka possesses a unique ability—exceptionally sharp hearing. Through his gentle demeanor and unparalleled expertise, Yutaka creates a serene, almost magical atmosphere where people can find solace. 5e3519f1-9b4b-4890-85c3-82ea2ac6f676:::||@!@||:::2025-01-27T01:41:20:::||@!@||:::{"id":"5e3519f1-9b4b-4890-85c3-82ea2ac6f676","title":{"en":"Silent Witch - another - Kekkai No Majutsushi No Nariagari"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"サイレント・ウィッチ -another- 結界の魔術師の成り上がり"}],"relatedIds":["2b5a3b43-effb-4f54-aa9b-d6093d523452"],"description":{"en":"Lewis, who grew up in a cold village, was such a genius that he memorized all the books on magic dropped by a visitor to his village in just one week. The book was dropped by Rutherford, a teacher at Minerva, the country's top magician training institute, and one of the Seven Wise Men, the Purple Smoke Sorcerer. Rutherford discovered Lewis' talent and made him a special student at Minerva, but Lewis, with his coarse and violent personality, was a problem child at the magic school. It turns out that Akane had put in one of the Movie Club's home-made video tapes in the time capsule, and the friends who had made the film decide to watch it together. However, there was a shocking voice left on the tape along with behind-the-scenes footage of the film's production…‼ Was Akane's death really a suicide…? They study at the Tenkei Magic Academy, where they develop their powers and learn fighting techniques.\n\nThroughout their journey, they face formidable enemies, such as evil cults and powerful beings. They befriend other mages and creatures, while discovering hidden secrets that threaten the peace of their world. Through difficult trials, they must not only defend their ideals, but also face the sacrifices necessary to preserve harmony between different peoples.","fr":"Kamigami no Tabi c'est l'histoire de Takeru, un jeune mage qui, aux côtés de ses amis Hana et Kaminari, se lance dans une aventure pour devenir plus fort et protéger ceux qu'il aime d'un mystérieux culte. Ils étudient à l'Académie de Magie de Tenkei, où ils développent leurs pouvoirs et apprennent des techniques de combat.\n\nAu fil de leur parcours, ils affrontent des ennemis redoutables, comme des cultes maléfiques et des êtres puissants. Ils se lient d'amitié avec d'autres mages et créatures, tout en découvrant des secrets cachés qui menacent la paix de leur monde. À travers des épreuves difficiles, ils doivent non seulement défendre leurs idéaux, mais aussi faire face aux sacrifices nécessaires pour préserver l'harmonie entre les différents peuples.","pt-br":"Kamigami no Tabi segue a história de Takeru, um jovem mago que, ao lado de seus amigos Hana e Kaminari, embarca em uma aventura para se tornar mais forte e proteger aqueles que ama de um culto misterioso. Eles estudam na Academia de Magia Tenkei, onde desenvolvem seus poderes e aprendem técnicas de combate.\n\nAo longo da jornada, eles enfrentam inimigos formidáveis, como cultos malignos e seres poderosos. Eles fazem amizade com outros magos e criaturas, enquanto descobrem segredos ocultos que ameaçam a paz do seu mundo. Por meio de provações difíceis, eles devem não apenas defender seus ideais, mas também enfrentar os sacrifícios necessários para preservar a harmonia entre os diferentes povos."},"links":{"raw":"https://www.wattpad.com/story/385273938?utm_source=ios\u0026utm_medium=link\u0026utm_content=story_info\u0026wp_page=story_details\u0026wp_uname=Hikarihxz"},"originalLanguage":"pt-br","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

In the Edo period (1603-1868), where the story takes place, most people who committed crimes were executed. One day, Saichiro, the son of a town doctor, is present when Yukinari slays a criminal. Later, Saichiro sees Yukinari ignoring his family members who are begging for the life of a criminal. He turns to Yukinari, who looks as if he doesn't care about people, and asks him if he doesn't even listen to him. Saichiro is dissatisfied with the answer, but then something happens. 1bfbb8cf-96ea-416e-b211-656a9eb04a57:::||@!@||:::2025-02-17T01:44:59:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1bfbb8cf-96ea-416e-b211-656a9eb04a57","title":{"en":"Kyou Kara Tsukaeru Isekai Ren'ai Manual"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"今日から使える異世界恋愛マニュアル"},{"en":"A Love Manual You Can Use From Today"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"\"I like you. Please go out with me—\"\n\nJust as Haruchika Isezaki confesses to his first love, he is suddenly summoned to another world. His summoner, the goddess Clemontine, gives him an unusual mission: to make seven girls, destined to become the mothers of the next generation of heroes, fall in love again. 151c9c3c-1365-4a84-aceb-e47d3100c772:::||@!@||:::2025-02-17T01:45:01:::||@!@||:::{"id":"151c9c3c-1365-4a84-aceb-e47d3100c772","title":{"en":"The Sacred Serpent's Seduction"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"신을품는방법"},{"ja":"神の授かり方"},{"de":"Das Schlingen der Schlange"}],"description":{"en":"How far would you be willing to go to save the ones you love? With his grandfather bordering life and death, Taesun takes on multiple jobs in order to pay a seemingly endless stack of hospital bills. On one of his odd jobs, he ascends the great mountain Geumryang, unknowingly the home of an eponymous serpentine spirit. When Taesun encounters the divine being, he too is on the brink of death, desperate for water in his slithering form. Taesun offers him a sip of water and saves the sacred snake from certain death. Later that night, a cold-blooded body embraces Taesun and offers him an exchange: bear the ancient being’s seed, and his grandfather will live. But is all really as it seems? 9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8:::||@!@||:::2025-02-17T01:45:04:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8","title":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"世紀末探偵倶楽部"},{"fr":"Fin de Siècle Detective Club"},{"en":"End-of-the-Century Detective Club"},{"en":"Sherlock Holmes - Fin de Siècle Detective Club"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club is dedicated to the very gay and very passionate love of Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson. It's blatantly based on Conan Doyle's work, and many of his characters make appearances throughout the story. In fact, the main story is split into three sub-stories -- each one focusing on a different aspect of the Holmes/Watson relationship.The first story is titled Paris Fin de Siècle, and is a light-hearted introduction to our protagonists. There's a little fluff, a little humor, a sardonic reunion with Arsène Lupin, and a sexually charged scene of boot-licking. (Actual boot-licking. Not the metaphorical kind!) There are also fabulous kisses, cross-dressing criminals and unusual confessions. No smut so far, though. That comes later on. Oh, yes.The last two stories are based on actual Conan Doyle plots. The second story is based on and named after The Adventure of the Three Garridebs, and the third is similarly inspired by A Scandal in Bohemia. It's wonderful to see Conan Doyle re-interpreted through a yaoi mangaka's eyes! It's particularly rewarding to see Holmes undergo a paradigm shift after Watson is shot in The Three Garridebs; Holmes realizes that he can't take the good doctor for granted anymore, and that his old friend has become so much more than a friend to him."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/世紀末探偵倶楽部-四谷シモーヌ-ebook/dp/B00HF3FXDE","ap":"seikimatsu-tantei-club","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/232603/","kt":"seikimatsu-tantei-kurabu","mal":"9290","mu":"qcaxpvq"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
